sentences.english: The principal must be hard-working, good at learning and enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 校长必须是一个勤奋学习，善于学习，勇于进取的人。

sentences.english: Principal Fung Sui Hing giving the welcome speech.
First is concern over the implications of Summers' ouster for an incoming president.
sentences.chinese: 首先是对驱逐萨莫斯校长迎来新校长的担忧。

sentences.english: First is concern over the implications of Summers' ouster for an incoming president.
sentences.chinese: 首先是对驱逐萨莫斯校长迎来新校长的担忧。

sentences.english: They will continue Mr. Kabe as acting principal of the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们将继续让凯布先生做该校代理校长。

sentences.english: Mr. President, thank you for your gracious introduction.
sentences.chinese: 校长先生，谢谢你的亲切介绍。

sentences.english: He became provost in 2006 and president the following year.
sentences.chinese: 他从2006年起担任教务长并于次年成为校长。

sentences.english: Please address your letter to the head-master's office.
sentences.chinese: 请在信上写好地址寄给该校校长室。

sentences.english: But have you ever heard that the students had holiday because the schoolmaster moved to new house?
sentences.chinese: 但是你听说过因为校长乔迁新居所以学生放假吗？

sentences.english: They have wheedled a holiday from the headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 他们哄骗校长而获得了假日。

sentences.english: He is old. He is our headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 他老了，他是我们的校长。

sentences.english: The president gave away prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 校长在学校运动会上颁发奖品。

sentences.english: Is your uncle a high school principal ?
sentences.chinese: 你的伯父是中学校长吗？

sentences.english: Prof Wang Zihao, the president of BUCT hosted the welcome reception.
sentences.chinese: 王子镐校长出席了欢迎晚宴并祝酒。

sentences.english: To qualify excellent elementary school principal brand could be considered.
sentences.chinese: 办理优质品牌校长认证，全面提升国民小学经营绩效。

sentences.english: Principal Wu celebrates Halloween with students of PAS.
sentences.chinese: 胡校长与雅校同学欢渡万圣节。

definition: teacher in charge of a class
to give classes/to work as a teacher
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc)/the school authorities
school official responsible for supervising the students (old)
person in charge of a place that ends in 園|园, such as a vineyard 葡萄園|葡萄园, zoo 動物園|动物园, cemetery 陵園|陵园 etc
